author: trevor haffenden
comment: Love the watch face but the numbers 11 and 12 are in the wrong place and there is no 10! Would happily give the app 5 stars if this could be rectified. Got it on Asus Zenwatch 2.

author: Ryu Kent
comment: I like the watch face. There is a problem with it not updating the phone battery percentage, even after a restart. Fix this and I will give 5 star.

reply.author: Karat
reply.content:
Update: Have you solved this problem?
Hi, kill Android Wear app from recent apps menu, then open it and access to Sword settings, then change anything you want, after a while it should show battery percentage.

author: Steve Metzger
comment: watch face is great looking & very functional. It keeps battery info for both phone and watch current, toggles between weather and steps, very easy to read. I love this app.  Even better, the developer was very responsive to questions I had about installation. I've Android Wear 2 on a Huawei watch.  I've been using the watch face for several days now and it really makes the Wear much more useful and valuable - highly recommended

reply.author: Karat
reply.content: Thanks a lot for the review!

author: Félix Agagnier
comment: there's a few errors in the square version: the hours are in the wrong order( 8-9-12-11), the 6 is too small? Also noticed that the automatic refresh for the weather doesn't work at all.  Please fix
title: Problems with square version

author: Alexander Casassovici
comment: On  the​ m600 the hours show "12" between 9 & 11.... Fix it and it gets 5* as it is it's just a bad joke

author: Agent Mathswiz53
comment: It goes 9-12-11 on the square face and the batter of phone doesn't update if it's on charge

author: Jim Patteson
comment: Will not sync with the watch...Can I get a refund?....UPDATE, thanks for the reply, works fine......GREAT FACE!

reply.author: Karat
reply.content: Please fix your rating, Hi, you've said that your problem was resolved please fix your rating.

title: I like it, but UPDATE works fine!

author: Blair Perry
comment: The watch looks great but I can customize anything on it. Just works as its downloaded.

reply.author: Karat
reply.content: You need to open Android Wear app, then open Sword settings, then turn on interactive mode. Then you can customize it by tapping watch or in this settings app.

title: Can't customize

author: Len Atfield-Cutts
comment: Face is nice but it's a battery eater from fresh charge to shutdown probably 5 hours

author: Mayur Shetty
comment: This looks so Good... Love it

author: Andrew Pullen
comment: Numbers fixed, thanks but Forces closes constantly on SW3, uninstalled and reinstalled and resynced apps several times. Look forward to the fix to get back my favourite face

reply.author: Karat
reply.content: Hi, I've fixed the issue with numbers and other small issues. Please update to the latest version of the watch face. Thanks a lot!

title: Getting there

author: Marc Thomas
comment: Knocked it outta the park once again
title: Simply the best

author: Jamie S
comment: This is my new favourite, thanks

reply.author: Karat
reply.content: Thanks a lot for the review!

title: Great work again

author: Aaron Pace
comment: Beautiful design with all the features. My new favorite.

reply.author: Karat
reply.content: Thanks a lot for the review! In the future updates will add more features like app shortcuts and more weather detail.

title: My new favorite

author: james kirkup
comment: Great! But serious battery drain on phone....

reply.author: Karat
reply.content: Hi, fixed battery drain, hope it will work, please update for the latest version. Thanks a lot!

title: Really nice but battery

author: William Hudson
comment: Can't change the color by tapping the watch

reply.author: Karat
reply.content: Hi, you should tap where the Label SWORD is located - Top Center. And In phone side companion app you should check Interactive mode to On. Please fill free to write me if anything is wrong. I'll fix it asap.
